endpoints.routeDesc: This endpoint generates and returns a "BonToutou" meme image

parameters.name: name
parameters.desc: The nickname that will be displayed on the meme.

parameters.name: colors
parameters.desc: The color(s) of the name parameter, they must be separated by | and can be RGB codes, hex. You can make a gradient with 2 colors and beyond 2 colors, each letter will have one color.
